title: Ep. 148 S&A Investor - Why I'm Buying Sears and JC Penney
itunes:title: Why I'm Buying Sears and JC Penney
description: Retail expert, MSNBC contributor, and former Bloomberg retail reporter Hitha Prabhakar says investors should buy depressed retail stocks JC Penney and Sears. She also talks about why retail sales will remain super strong at least through 2013.
content:encoded: Retail expert, MSNBC contributor, and former Bloomberg retail reporter Hitha Prabhakar says investors should buy depressed retail stocks JC Penney and Sears. She also talks about why retail sales will remain super strong at least through 2013.
